extendedInfo.description: Designed to enhance the listening experience with Denonâs new line of Globe Cruiserâ¢ headphones, the Denon Travel app allows you to merge your music and favorite travel applications for the ultimate travel experience. The app features a premium audio player that lets you experience the best possible sound quality from your digital music library or favorite Internet radio stations, create, & save custom EQ curves and audio effects, create & save instant playlists, & enjoy internet radio stations via the built-in TuneIn service. Integrate your favorite travel applications for convenient access directly from within the Denon Travel app, and move effortlessly when youâre on the go. Pair the Denon Travel app with Denon Globe Cruiserâ¢ Headphones for an enhanced business travel experience.EQ FEATURES: - Graphical equalizer for your music library - 5 band EQ - 3 audio effects (Virtualizer, Bass Boost, and Reverb) - 10 built in EQ Presets - Save and create your own audio presets - Bypass mode to quickly compare the original and equalized audioMUSIC LIBRARY FEATURES: - Enhances your listening experience with Denon Globe Cruiser Headphones or other audio playback devices such as a/v receivers, car stereos via USB, or Bluetooth. - Powerful queue based playback system lets you build and order your own playlist on the fly. - Save the playback queue as a new playlist - A single song, all songs on an album, all song by an artist, and all songs in a genre can easily be added to the now playing queue. - Supports both portrait and landscape modes for browsing, playing, and equalizing - Shuffle and repeat playback modes - Music library browsing by Playlist, Artist, Album, Song, Genre, Composer, Compilation, and Podcast (no importing needed)INTERNET RADIO FEATURES: - The TuneIn service provides global acces to Internet radio âcovering over 70,000 radio stations and 2 million on-demand programs including sports, news, talk, music and comedy.  - Browse Internet radio stations by location, genre, language or Podcast (on-demand programs). - Powerful search feature for your music library and Internet Radio  - Save your favorite Internet Radio stations or programs as convenient presets and share them with your other TuneIn  compatible devices - Ability to choose high or low quality streams offered by broadcastersADDITIONAL FEATURES: - Integrate your favorite travel applications within the Denon Travel app for easy access on the go.  - Share what youâre listening to via Facebook, Twitter, Google+, Email, or Text MessageNOTICES: - The Denon Travel app requires Android 2.2.x or later - DRM protected iTunes music is NOT supported - WiFi or data connection required to stream Internet radio
